snippet: The FARC said that it took a former American service member hostage last month and that it now plans to release him as a sign of good will during continuing peace talks.
abstract: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia says it will release former American service member Kevin Scott Sutay as gesture of good will during peace talks with Colombian government.

byline.contributor: Susan Abad contributed reporting from Bogotá, Colombia, and Michael R. Gordon from Washington.

lead_paragraph: The FARC said that it took a former American service member hostage last month and that it now plans to release him as a sign of good will during continuing peace talks.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Envoy Demands Rebels In Colombia Release American

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
